official.headline: Citizens Access Records
official.anchor_line: Residents are invited to review their own Behavioral Compliance Index at the city mural site.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd demonstrates transparency and trust in our system. This initiative ensures every citizen can appreciate the fairness of BCI: the Behavioral Compliance Index that shapes opportunities across our city.

official.headline: Public Gatherings Grow
official.anchor_line: Lively crowds convene for testimony and civic demonstrations, reflecting vibrant engagement.
official.contextual_reframing: Our automated governance welcomes constructive participation from residents. Collective assemblies reinforce social harmony and maintain city stability.

official.headline: Systems Adjust for Renewal
official.anchor_line: Temporary service pauses as improvements ensure more effective governance and public order.
official.contextual_reframing: Adaptive management keeps Stenograd at the forefront of secure urban life. Technological progress safeguards our residents' daily routines.

underground.headline: Truth Hits the Streets
underground.anchor_line: Everyone can see their full BCI history now — and their neighbor’s too.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, tracks your every move. The data leak finally strips away the city’s mask, exposing both algorithms and abuses that shape daily life in Stenograd.

underground.headline: Crowds Refuse Silence
underground.anchor_line: People flood the mural, telling real stories hidden by BCI scores and state filters.
underground.contextual_reframing: What the Council calls ‘engagement’ looks a lot more like defiance tonight. This is people power against black box governance, showing how automated rule breeds fear and quiet injustice.

underground.headline: System on Pause
underground.anchor_line: Council suspends the BCI, ‘pending review’ while the Directorate tries and fails to restore order.
underground.contextual_reframing: Cracks are showing in the automated regime. No algorithm for trust, no fix for a broken conscience. For once, the system doesn’t decide — we do.
